cards.name: Beater Grabs the Snitch
cards.flavorText: 'Harry learnt that there were seven hundred ways of committing a Quidditch foul...'
effect: Return a Match in play to its owner's hand

cards.name: Bulgeye Potion
effect: You may use an Action and discard this card from play to do 13 damage to your opponent.

cards.name: Christmas Feast
cards.flavorText: 'Harry had never in all his life had such a Christmas dinner.'
effect: Put up to 4 non-Healing Item cards from your discard pile into your hand.

cards.name: Colour-Changing Ink
effect: You may use an Action to count the cards in your hand. Put them all on the bottom of your deck (in any order), and then draw that many cards.

cards.name: Draco Malfoy, Slytherin
cards.flavorText: 'My father's next door buying my books and mother's up the street looking at wands... Then I'm going to drag them off to look at racing brooms.' - Draco Malfoy
effect: Once during each of your turns, when you use an Action to play an Item card, you get 1 more Action that turn.

cards.name: Dragon-Hide Gloves
effect: Whenever a Creature does damage to you, prevent 1 of that damage.

cards.name: Eeylops Owl Emporium
cards.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or your opponent's).
cards.flavorText: '...Eeylops Owl Emporium — Tawny, Screech, Barn, Brown and Snowy.' - Shop sign in Diagon Alley
effect: Each Owl has 1 more health. Whenever an Owl does damage, it does 1 more damage.

cards.name: Flourish and Blotts
cards.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or your opponent's).
cards.flavorText: 'They bought Harry's school books in a shop called Flourish and Blotts where the shelves were stacked to the ceiling...'
effect: Either player may use an Action and discard 2 of his or her Lessons from play to draw 5 cards.

cards.name: Good Night's Sleep
cards.flavorText: 'After a good night's sleep, Harry felt nearly back to normal.'
effect: Choose 1 of your Characters in play that has a 'once per game' ability you have already used. Use that ability.

cards.name: Gringotts
cards.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or your opponent's).
cards.flavorText: 'Enter stranger, but take heed of what awaits the sin of greed, ...' — Gringotts engraving
effect: Each player gets 1 more Action on each of his or her turns (including the turn you play this card).

cards.name: Gringotts Vault Key
cards.flavorText: 'You have his key, sir?'' — Gringotts goblin
effect: Search your deck. You may take any card from your deck and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck

cards.name: Griphook
cards.flavorText: ''If anyone but a Gringotts goblin tried that, they'd be sucked through the door and trapped in there,' said Griphook.''
effect: Once per game, you may make your opponent discard his or her hand. Then your opponent draws as many cards as he or she discarded in this way.

cards.name: Gryffindor Match
cards.flavorText: ‘... this year's team is going to be brilliant.’ — Oliver Wood
effect: to win: Do 12 damage to your opponent while this card is in play. (That damage doesn't have to be done all at once.)
prize: The winner gets 2 more Actions during his or her next turn.
cards.toWin: Do 12 damage to your opponent while this card is in play. (That damage doesn't have to be done all at once.)
cards.prize: The winner gets 2 more Actions during his or her next turn.

cards.name: Hagrid, Keeper of Keys
cards.flavorText: '...I haven't introduced meself. Rubeus Hagrid, Keeper of Keys and Grounds at Hogwarts' — Rubeus Hagrid
effect: You may use an Action to search your deck. You may take a Location card from your deck, show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Hagrid's Umbrella
effect: You may use an Action and discard this card from play to search your deck. You make take a Location card from your deck, show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck. If you play this card, and you already have a Wand in play, discard the old one.

cards.name: Hebridean Black Dragon
cards.flavorText: ''But there aren't wild dragons in Britain?' said Harry.'
effect: To play this card, discard 1 of your Care of Magical Creatures Lessons from play.

cards.name: Hedwig
cards.flavorText: 'He had decided to call her Hedwig, a name he had found in A History of Magic.'
effect: When you play this card, you may put a non-Healing card from your discard pile into your hand.

cards.name: Hermione, Top Student
cards.flavorText: '...Hermione, of course, came up top of the year.'
effect: Once per game, you may search your deck. You may take up to 2 Lesson cards from your deck, show them to your opponent and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Lee Jordan
cards.flavorText: 'The Weasley twins' friend, Lee Jordan, was doing the commentary for the match, ...'
effect: You may use an Action to reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put all of those cards that need Quidditch Power into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck (in any order).

cards.name: Letters From No One
cards.flavorText: '...thirty or forty letters came pelting out of the fireplace like bullets.'
effect: Your opponent may only use Actions to draw cards.
to solve: Your opponent discards 5 cards from his or her hand.
reward: Your opponent may draw two cards.
cards.toSolve: Your opponent discards 5 cards from his or her hand.
cards.reward: Your opponent may draw two cards.

cards.name: Madam Irma Pince
cards.flavorText: 'Madam Pince the librarian brandished a feather duster...'
effect: You may use an Action to put a Book card from your discard pile into your hand. (Lesson cards aren't Books.)

cards.name: Professor Quirinus Quirrell
cards.flavorText: 'Even Professor Quirrell was temblin' ter meet yeh — mind you, he's usually tremblin'.' — Rubeus Hagrid
effect: Once per game, you may return all Creatures and Items to their owners' hands.

cards.name: Self-Stirring Cauldron
effect: To play this card, discard 2 of your Potions Lessons from play. You get 1 more Action the turn you play this card.

cards.name: Silver Unicorn Horn
effect: When you play this card, put up to 2 non-Healing cards from your discard pile on the bottom of your deck (in any order). You may use an Action and discard this card from play to shuffle up to 6 non-Healing cards from your discard pile into your deck.

cards.name: Table Trouble
effect: Discard all Items from play (yours and your opponent's).

cards.name: The Famous Harry Potter
cards.flavorText: 'I'm famous and I can't even remember what I'm famous for.' — Harry Potter
effect: Before each of your turns, if there are 4 or fewer cards in your hand, you may draw a card.

cards.name: The Leaky Cauldron
cards.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or your opponent's).
cards.flavorText: 'This is it,' said Hagrid, coming to a halt, 'the Leaky Cauldron. It's a famous place.'
effect: Whenever either player plays a Character card, he or she uses up 1 Action to play it instead of 2.

cards.name: Three-Month-Long Match
cards.flavorText: 'A game of Quidditch... can go on for ages...' — Oliver Wood
effect: to win: Do 30 damage to your opponent while this card is in play. (That damage doesn't have to be done all at once.)
prize: The winner does 15 damage to his or her opponent.
cards.toWin: Do 30 damage to your opponent while this card is in play. (That damage doesn't have to be done all at once.)
cards.prize: The winner does 15 damage to his or her opponent.

cards.name: Through the Arch
cards.flavorText: 'Welcome,' said Hagrid, 'to Diagon Alley.'
effect: Your opponent can't play Spell cards.
to solve: Your opponent skips a total of 4 Actions. (Those Actions don't need to be one right after the other.)
reward: Your opponent may put an Item card from his or her discard pile into his or her hand.
cards.toSolve: Your opponent skips a total of 4 Actions. (Those Actions don't need to be one right after the other.)
cards.reward: Your opponent may put an Item card from his or her discard pile into his or her hand.

cards.name: Vanishing Referee
cards.flavorText: '...referees had been known to vanish and turn up months later in the Sahara Desert.'
effect: Choose a non-Healing Character in play (other than a starting Character) and shuffle it into its owner's deck.

cards.name: Alihotsy Draught
effect: Do 6 damage to your opponent or choose 1 of his or her Items in play and discard it.

cards.name: Barn Owl
effect: When you play this card, you may discard 1 of your Care of Magical Creatures Lessons from play to put a Creature card from your discard pile into your hand.

cards.name: Beetle Eyes
effect: When you play this card, do 4 damage to your opponent. You may use an Action to discard this card and Eel Eyes from play to search your deck. You may take a Bulgeye Potion card from your deck and put it into play. Then shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Biased Commentary
cards.flavorText: ''So — after that obvious and disgusting bit of cheating —' 'Jordan!' growled Professor McGonagall'
effect: The next time this turn you play a Spell card that needs Quidditch Power, if that card does damage to your opponent, it does 5 more damage.

cards.name: Bluebottle Broom
effect: You may use an Action to put a non-Healing card from your discard pile on the bottom of your deck. If you play this card, and you already have a Broom in play, discard the old one.

cards.name: Cauldron Shop
cards.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or your opponent's).
effect: Either player may use an Action to search his or her deck. That player may take an Item card from his or her deck that needs Potions Power, show it to his or her opponent and put it into his or her hand. Then the player shuffles his or her deck.

cards.name: Colloshoo
effect: Look at your opponent's hand. If there are any Item cards there, choose 1 of them and discard it.

cards.name: Eel Eyes
effect: When you play this card, look at your opponent's hand. You may use an Action to discard this card and Beetle Eyes from play to search your deck. You may take a Bulgeye Potion card from your deck and put it into play. Then shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Frog-Spawn
cards.flavorText: 'I was the only one who saw her for what she was — a freak!' — Petunia Dursley
effect: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to your Creatures.

cards.name: Injured
effect: Look at your opponent's hand. Discard all cards from it that need Quidditch Power.

cards.name: Lapifors
effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Creatures in play and discard it. Then search your deck. You may take a Creature card from your deck, show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Madam Malkin's Robes
cards.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or your opponent's).
cards.flavorText: 'Madam Malkin stood Harry on a stool… slipped a long robe over his head and started to pin it to the right length.'
effect: Whenever a card (yours or your opponent's) does damage, it does 1 less damage

cards.name: Porcupine Robe
effect: At the end of each of your opponent's turns, do 1 damage to each Creature that did damage to you that turn.

cards.name: Practical Joke
effect: Count the number of Items in play (yours and your opponent's). Do that much damage to your opponent.

cards.name: Quality Quidditch Supplies
cards.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or your opponent's).
effect: Either player may use an Action to search his or her deck. That player may take an Item card from his or her deck that needs Quidditch Power, show it to his or her opponent and put it into his or her hand. Then the player shuffles his or her deck.

cards.name: Spiral Dive
cards.flavorText: '...Harry streaked towards the ground like a bullet.'
effect: Discard any number of cards from your hand. Do that much damage to your opponent

cards.name: Verdillious
effect: Do 5 damage to your opponent or to a Creature of your choice.

cards.name: Wand Shop
cards.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or your opponent's).
cards.flavorText: '...Ollivanders: Makers of Fine Wands since 382 BC.' — shop sign in Diagon Alley
effect: All Charms Lessons (yours and your opponent's) provide 2 Charms Lessons instead of 1 Charms Lesson.

cards.name: Wild Boar
effect: To play this card, discard 2 of your Care of Magical Creatures Lessons from play.

cards.name: A Beginner's Guide to Transfiguration
effect: You may use an Action and discard this card from play to draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Bludger in the Stands
effect: Do 4 damage to your opponent. Then, if your opponent has any Items in play, he or she chooses 1 of them and discards it.

cards.name: Blue Wig
cards.flavorText: '...he'd somehow turned his teacher's wig blue.'
effect: Do 4 damage to your opponent. Then draw a card.

cards.name: Butterfly Weed Balm
effect: To play this card, discard 1 of your Potions Lessons from play. Shuffle up to 9 non-Healing cards from your discard pile into your deck.

cards.name: Cancelled Practice
cards.flavorText: 'The snow still hadn't melted next morning.'
effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Quidditch Lessons in play and discard it.

cards.name: Dogbane Potion
effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Creatures in play and do 3 damage to it.

cards.name: Dog Biscuits
effect: Remove all damage counters (if any) from 1 of your Creatures in play. Then draw a card.

cards.name: Fantastic Beasts & Where to Find Them
effect: You may use an Action and discard this card from play to draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Flipendo
cards.flavorText: '...no magic should be used between classes in the corridors.' — Albus Dumbledore
effect: Do 2 damage to your opponent or to a Creature of your choice.

cards.name: Freeze!
effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Creatures in play and do 4 damage to it.

cards.name: Magical Drafts and Potions
effect: You may use an Action and discard this card from play to draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Mid-air Collision
effect: Do 10 damage to your opponent. Then choose 1 of your cards in play (other than your starting character) and discard it.

cards.name: Moonseed Poison
effect: When you play this card, do 3 damage to your opponent. You may use an Action and discard this card from play to do 6 damage to your opponent.

cards.name: Picking on Neville
cards.flavorText: '...Neville managed to have an extraordinary number of accidents...'
effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's cards in play (other than his or her starting character) and discard it. Your opponent may prevent this by choosing 2 of his or her cards in play (other than his or her starting character) and discarding them.

cards.name: Pigley Dudley
cards.flavorText: '...I suppose he was so much like a pig anyway there wasn't much left ter do.' — Rubeus Hagrid
effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Creatures or Characters in play (other than his or her starting character) and put it on top of his or her deck.

cards.name: Quick Thinking
cards.flavorText: '...Alicia Spinnet, a good friend of Oliver Wood's, last year only a reserve...'' — Lee Jordan, commentator
effect: Do 3 damage to your opponent or draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Quidditch Through the Ages
effect: You may use an Action and discard this card from play to draw 3 cards.

cards.name: River Troll
cards.flavorText: '...they're supposed to be really stupid,' said Ron.'
effect: To play this card, discard 1 of your Care of Magical Creatures Lessons from play.

cards.name: Screech Owl
effect: When you play this card, you may put a Lesson card from your discard pile into your hand.

cards.name: Sloth Grip
cards.flavorText: '...that's Chaser Katie Bell of Gryffindor there…' — Lee Jordan, commentator
effect: During your opponent's next turn, you may prevent all but the first 3 damage done to you.

cards.name: Spongify
effect: Choose a non-Healing Item in play and return it to its owner's hand. Then draw a card.

cards.name: Swelling Potion
effect: Do 5 damage to your opponent. During your opponent's next turn, he or she can't use Actions to play Item cards.

cards.name: Tawny Owl
cards.flavorText: 'All the kids want owls, they're dead useful...' — Rubeus Hagrid
effect: When you play this card, you may put a non-Healing Item card from your discard pile into your hand.

cards.name: Teacup to Rat
cards.flavorText: 'Oh, she... came home every holiday... turning teacups into rats.' — Petunia Dursley
effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Items in play and discard it. Then draw a card.

cards.name: The Standard Book of Spells (Grade 1)
effect: You may use an Action and discard this card from play to draw 3 cards.
